text:
When installed and run as a service, tomcat cannot find "javac" to compile JSPs.

This seems to be because the IMAGE_PATH variable does not include

%JAVA_HOME%\lib\tools.jar

when this is added, everything seems fine.
creator: mgc@cutthecrap.biz

text:
This is supposed to be copied to common/lib by the installer.
At least for now that's how it works.
creator: remm@apache.org

text:
I can understand the "invalid" at the moment, but this means that when you
change your JAVA_HOME variable the tools.jar used won't change even if you
re-install the service -- which is not cool.

Adding %JAVA_HOME%\lib\tools.jar to the image/class path seems a lot nicer (and
does not require extra steps for those not using the installer).
creator: jessh@ptc.com
